subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] blue lighting
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1216394156
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Andrea,
 
Sounds like a vortex may have been opening up in your hallway.  Have  you had 
any paranormal ativity in your house before?
 
Jeff
 
 
 
 
In a message dated 7/18/2008 2:27:28 A.M. Central Standard Time,  
fairlia@... writes:

 
 
 
Hi All,
 
I am Andrea Carr who is a 41 year old wife and  mom of 1 daughter. I am sorry 
I have not written before but I have a terrible  year and haven't had the 
time to concentrate on EVP like I had prior. I won't  get into the details but it 
has left me in the midst of OK just trying to pull  through all of this BS & 
I will get back to it when I  can.
 
Unfortunatley I am leaving for the weekend  tomorrow morning and won't see my 
e-mails until Monday morning. 
 
I have a question for any one here. I believe in  aliens, spirit and ghost 
communications via evp but tonight I had an  experience I never had before.
 
I woke up at exactly 2:22 by my stove's clock and  went and cleaned my sink 
of dishes while I heated up some cream chipped beef  (albiet not too exciting) 
but while I sat there after in the dark with my  family sleeping my hallway 
ilummating a light clored blue several times.  Anyone else ever seen this?
 
I look forward to any responses.
 
Thanks!
Andrea
